mapper.select: select stu.id,stu.code,stu.name,stu.phone,reg.total_sections as totalSections, case when arr.arraged_sections is null then 0 else arr.arranged_sections end as arrangedSections from mas.student stu inner join biz.registion reg on reg.student_id=stu.id left join (select course_id,student_id,count(0) as arraged_sections from biz.shift_results group by course_id,student_id) arr on arr.course_id=reg.course_id and arr.student_id=reg.student_id where reg.course_id=#{courseId}
